{{title|deduction guides for {{tt|std::valarray}}}}
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|valarray}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|
template&lt; typename T, std::size_t cnt &gt;
valarray( const T(&amp;)[cnt], std::size_t ) -&gt; valarray&lt;T&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

This [[cpp/language/class template argument deduction|deduction guide]] is provided for {{lc|std::valarray}} to allow deduction from array and size (note that deduction from pointer and size is covered by the implicit guides).

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;valarray&gt;

int main()
{
    int a[] = {1, 2, 3, 4};
    std::valarray va(a, 3); // uses explicit deduction guide
    for (int x : va)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; x &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=1 2 3
}}
